Pre-Game Insights: Englandâ€™s last assignment in the shortest format was way back in December 2023 when they toured the West Indies. They lost the series by a 3-2 margin.
With the T20 World Cup just around the corner, they will be looking to get their combinations right.
Jofra Archer will return after a long layoff due to an injury. It remains to be seen how he goes about his business at the highest level.
Most of the players in the squad are returning from IPL 2024 and will be looking to carry forward their form.
Pakistan will be looking to repeat their performance against this strong English side.
Babar Azam will be leading Pakistan in the series and the T20 World Cup 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Headingley offers a good amount of assistance to the pacers.
Adapting to the conditions will be the key for the batters.
Once set, they can start playing their strokes freely and put the pressure back on the bowlers.
There won't be ideal conditions on offer for a game of cricket in Leeds.
There is a high chance of rain predicted on Wednesday, with the temperature expected to be under 15 degrees Celsius.
Others: England are all set to host Pakistan for a four-match T20I series as a preparation for the T20 World Cup 2024.
Expect both sides to try out different combinations in this series.
As the hosts and the defending T20 World Cup champions, England have the edge in this series.
Prediction: England to win this contest.
